channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Horses on ’86 Field! | Every Wednesday
item.description: Did we get your attention? Join us for an engaging experience with Genuine Equine! These summer weekly sessions during the Arch Summer feature Assisted Learning for Wellness in the first hour, followed by Expressive Arts in the second hour. Don’t miss out—use the QR code or use the link provided to sign up and be part of this transformative journey!
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Summer Kick-Off | Monday, May 19 | 12-2 PM
item.description: Join us for the Arch Summer Kick-Off Monday, May 19 from 12-2 PM on ’86 Field! This is a perfect opportunity to relax, connect with the community, and celebrate the start of the season together. Be sure to visit the Resource tent, where you can find student support offices and grab some free swag!
item.author: Students

item.title: An Evening with President Schmidt: Summer Arch! | June 10
item.description: The Arch and the CCPD would like to formally invite you to An Evening with President Schmidt: Summer Arch! This event will be held on Tuesday, June 10 from 5:00-7:00 P.M. at President Schmidt’s Residence. Please RSVP on Handshake by May 27th to join us!

item.title: Summer Parking Permits Now Available for Purchase
item.description: Students enrolled in summer classes and Arch: Summer parking permits are now on sale! Please be sure to purchased your summer parking permit to avoid any parking violations. Permits are required on all Rensselaer property. To register please visit: https://rpi.aimsparking.com If you have any questions, please contact Parking and Transportation at 518-276-6616 or parking@rpi.edu. Drive safely and have a great summer semester!
item.author: Students

item.title: Summer Arch Shuttle Service
item.description: Parking and Transportation is pleased to announce to the Rensselaer community that the Summer Arch shuttle service will begin on Monday, May 19th. Shuttle operating hours are posted on the Parking and Transportation website. Any questions please call Parking and Transportation at 518-276-6616.

item.title: CCPD Virtual Summer Series: RBC Bearings | May 20
item.description: The CCPD’s series of virtual summer info sessions is back! Join us this summer to learn about companies who will be offering internships and co-ops during the 2025-2026 academic year. RBC Bearings is our first employer on May 20, 2025 starting at 4:30 PM! Registration and more info in Handshake!

item.title: Webinars to be Included in Webex Suite
item.description: The Webex Suite meeting platform will include Webinars as of May 29, 2025. All Webinars, including those scheduled prior to this date but running after May 29, will be run on the new platform. In order to utilize the new experience, the installed Webex App must be version 45.4 or newer. If you need assistance to update your Webex App, please submit a support request.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Capital Region Basketball Camp at RPI!
item.description:
The Capital Region Basketball Camp for kids age 8-15, is a unique summer camp in which RPI Head Men’s Basketball Coach Mark Gilbride, and his staff have designed programs to develop all facets of each camper’s game, as well as help increase their individual and team skills in an atmosphere that is challenging, competitive, and fun. Enjoy the convenience of dropping your child off at a sports camp right where you work!
